result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Samantha J. Kunz

records.addlTxt:
(Cases 21CF800, 21CF831, 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272, 22CF789, 22CF908 are called at 2:11 PM- by Zoom) Defendant Samantha J. Kunz in court.  Attorney Robert Allen Thorson appeared by video for Samantha J. Kunz.  Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver in 21CF800, 21CF831, 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 22CF92, 22CF272, 22CF789, 22CF908. 
Arraignment in 21CF800, 21CF831, 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272, 22CF789, 22CF908 & Hearing in 21CM986, 21CT256 to be scheduled with Branch 4 Judicial Assistant.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Cases called at 2:05 PM: 21CF800, 21CF831, 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272, 22CF789.
Defendant Samantha J. Kunz not in court.  Attorney Robert Allen Thorson in court for Samantha J. Kunz.  Attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Counsel requests an adjournment as the Defendant is currently in the hospital. 
State moves to amend the Cash Bond in 22CF789 to a Signature Bond with all conditions remaining as previously ordered.Court so orders.
Preliminary Hearings rescheduled to 8/16/22 at 2:00 PM.
Preliminary hearing on July 26, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

(Cases 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CF831, 21CF800, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272, 22CF789 are called at 11:41 AM- by Zoom) Defendant Samantha Kunz appears in custody via video conference from the Jail with Attorney Ryan Kohler. ADA Matthew Kirkpatrick appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
Warrants are executed in 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CF831, 21CF800, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272. Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint in 22CF789 and updates the Defendant's address and phone number. Defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation. State requests $500 cash bond- recites failures to appear. Defense requests signature bond. Court orders $500 cash bond in case 22CF789 with various conditions and orders the previously ordered bonds remain in effect in 21CF1087, 21CF1095, 21CF831, 21CF800, 21CM986, 21CT256, 22CF92, 22CF272. 
Preliminary Hearing: 07/26/2022 at 2:00 PM.

ADDRESS INFO for Samantha J. Kunz
Current: 3450 Hillview Road, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 07-14-2022)
Prior: 5517 Brookdale Rd N Apt 106, Brooklyn Park, MN 55433
